text:
@BernieSanders @nursevictoria11 @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson Why are you skipping a procedural vote on the coronavirus relief bill in the Senate right now to do your stupid social media rally?

Ilhan and her tea party buddies should take a good look at how you lost 30% of your voters from 2016 in Vermont 

#FlipTheSenate
#DNC
#Biden2020
